attributes.additional_details:
With the increase in energy prices, many gyms are struggling to cover cost and may start closing because of this.
Gyms are a huge help in the ever increasing obesity problem and consequence stretch on the NHS.
If you could help, in the long run we will help everyone.
attributes.background:
Look at the VAT Gyms have to pay on Gym Membership.
Remove the amount.
